message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I'll give you a bit less to start. Your turn to think about it!
You gave me a bit less, so I'll give you a bit more. Your turn again!
You're moving in the right direction, but I'm still not satisfied. I'll give you a bit more, but don't get too comfortable!
You're not giving me much, but I'll give you a bit more. Let's see if you'll take it this time!
